section.p: At this point, the system is ready to be deployed. Make sure you are logged on as root on your ansible box and that your current directory is /root/
section.note: As well as configuring your vars and vault files, you must also provide a backups configuration file in the group_vars folder when running site.yml. An example file is provided in the repository named backups.sample. Rename it to backups before running the playbooks. Details on how to configure this file are available in the section .
